languages.text: "Вместе с Летусом были уничтожены следующие ценные механизмы: грузовые платформы, манипуляторы, автоматические рельс-направляющие, транспортеры класса C/1-0-5..."

traits.locale_text: "Вместе с Летусом были уничтожены следующие ценные механизмы: грузовые платформы, манипуляторы, автоматические рельс-направляющие, транспортеры класса C/1-0-5..."

languages.text: "Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."
languages.original_text: "Вместе с Летусом были уничтожены следующие ценные механизмы: грузовые платформы, манипуляторы, автоматические рельс-направляющие, транспортеры класса C/1-0-5..."

traits.locale_text: "Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."
"Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."
"Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."
"Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."
"Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."
"Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."

languages.text: 「リーザスとともに、以下の神聖なる機械が破壊された。積載プラットフォーム、工業用マニピュレイター、自動ガイドレール、C/1-0-5級輸送機…」
languages.original_text: "Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."

traits.locale_text: 「リーザスとともに、以下の神聖なる機械が破壊された。積載プラットフォーム、工業用マニピュレイター、自動ガイドレール、C/1-0-5級輸送機…」

languages.text: "Zusammen mit Leethus wurden auch folgende ehrwürdige Mechanismen zerstört: Ladeplattformen, industrielle Manipulatoren, automatisierte Führungsschienen, Transporter der Klasse C/1-0-5 ..."
languages.original_text: "Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."

traits.locale_text: "Zusammen mit Leethus wurden auch folgende ehrwürdige Mechanismen zerstört: Ladeplattformen, industrielle Manipulatoren, automatisierte Führungsschienen, Transporter der Klasse C/1-0-5 ..."

languages.text: « La destruction de Leethus a occasionné la perte des mécanismes vénérés suivants : plateformes de chargement, manipulateurs industriels, rails de guidage automatiques, transporteurs de classe C/1-0-5... »
languages.original_text: "Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."

traits.locale_text: « La destruction de Leethus a occasionné la perte des mécanismes vénérés suivants : plateformes de chargement, manipulateurs industriels, rails de guidage automatiques, transporteurs de classe C/1-0-5... »

languages.text: «Junto con Leethus, han resultado destruidos los siguientes mecanismos venerables: plataformas de carga, manipuladores industriales, rieles de guiado automatizados, transportes clase C/1-0-5...».
languages.original_text: "Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."

traits.locale_text: «Junto con Leethus, han resultado destruidos los siguientes mecanismos venerables: plataformas de carga, manipuladores industriales, rieles de guiado automatizados, transportes clase C/1-0-5...».

languages.text: “随着利瑟斯的毁灭，下列神圣机器同样遭到了摧毁，其中包括：装载平台、工业操纵器、自动导轨，C/1-0-5式运输机……”
languages.original_text: "Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."

traits.locale_text: “随着利瑟斯的毁灭，下列神圣机器同样遭到了摧毁，其中包括：装载平台、工业操纵器、自动导轨，C/1-0-5式运输机……”

languages.text: "Leethus'la birlikte yok edilen muhterem mekanizmalar: Yükleme platformları, sınai çevirteçler, otomatik kılavuz rayları, C/1-0-5 sınıfı taşıyıcılar..."
languages.original_text: "Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."

traits.locale_text: "Leethus'la birlikte yok edilen muhterem mekanizmalar: Yükleme platformları, sınai çevirteçler, otomatik kılavuz rayları, C/1-0-5 sınıfı taşıyıcılar..."

languages.original_text: "Along with Leethus, the following venerated mechanisms were destroyed: loading platforms, industrial manipulators, automated guide rails, class C/1-0-5 transporters..."
